question: 据え付ける
sourceMnemonic: This is a combination of the words <ja>据える</ja>, meaning "to install," and <ja>付ける</ja>, meaning "to attach." Put them together and you're still going <vocabulary>to install</vocabulary> something or <vocabulary>to equip</vocabulary> something. There's just more hands on work happening.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings. You learned them when you learned the kanji, so you should be able to read this on your own.
